text.emotional: [sadness, low]I never met it much to my dismay. David never met it[/sadness]. Your Grandpa can’t remember any owls around here, and others just repeat what their relatives told’ em.
text.silence: {....} i never met it {...} much to my dismay {....} david never met it {...} your grandpa can't remember any owls around here and others just repeat what their relatives told em {...}
